attributes.action: No VAT on Fuel in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
It's awful first of all that we get taxed twice on fuel in this country, but it's also no inline with any other country within the EU.
The without duty or tax on fuel the price would be around 56p per litre for petrol, why am I paying 60% Tax?
I want the Government to stop taxing us twice, pick one. Fuel duty or VAT which will help bring the price down for Families within the UK who rely on their own vehicles to be able to function day to day.
